about_the_game:
The Obsidian Operative Pack contains 5 Exclusive Obsidian Operative Skins, with their corresponding Mercs, including the brand-new skin for Aimee!



Obsidian Operative Skins for:

Aimee

Arty

Fletcher

Phoenix

Stoker
detailed_description:
The Obsidian Operative Pack contains 5 Exclusive Obsidian Operative Skins, with their corresponding Mercs, including the brand-new skin for Aimee!



Obsidian Operative Skins for:

Aimee

Arty

Fletcher

Phoenix

Stoker

name: Dirty Bomb - Obsidian Operative Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: 512MB - GeForce 7800GTX
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core or better
  • Graphics: 2GB - GeForce 710 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

short_description: The Obsidian Operative Pack contains 5 Exclusive Obsidian Operative Skins, with their corresponding Mercs, including the brand-new skin for Aimee!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
